alert.note: Alert for Divide (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:28AM CDT until July 10 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR WESTERN WILLIAMS AND DIVIDE COUNTIES... At 127 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Fortuna to 10 miles east of Grenora to 13 miles east of Bainville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Williston and Alamo around 145 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Zahl, Fort Buford State Historical Site, Appam, Hanks, Ambrose, Trenton, and Blacktail Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
